data.name: Beast
data.description: Beast is a master of Mutant science who improves any X-Men team by healing and granting positive effects.

starItems.name: Beast
starItems.description: Beast is a master of Mutant science who improves any X-Men team by healing and granting positive effects.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, they flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, they flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, they flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, they flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, they flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Always flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, they flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on each target.

When this character performs a Counterattack or Assist, they flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on each target.

1.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Heal the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

2.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Heal the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured allies for <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

3.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Heal the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade: Clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Heal the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured allies for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Heal the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured allies for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

6.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Heal the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to all enemies

7.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> allies.
Heal the <color=#86e619>2</color> most injured allies for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

1.description: Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color>, <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color>, <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>Support</color> and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color>, <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>Support</color> and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color>, <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>Support</color> and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade: Generate Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>Support</color> and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color>, <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and generate Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>Support</color> and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color>, <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and generate Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>Support</color> and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
6.nextUpgrade: Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> allies

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>BLASTER</color>, <color=#fff568>BRAWLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color>, <color=#fff568>CONTROLLER</color>, and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> and generate Ability Energy for self and all <color=#fff568>Support</color> and <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> or <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>MUTANT</color> allies.

1.description: If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies at the start of a battle, the first ally death does not count towards the loss of a Medal in <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGNS</color> and <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the most injured ally

2.description:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the most injured ally.

If this character has three or more <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies at the start of a battle, the first ally death does not count towards the loss of a Medal in <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGNS</color> and <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color>.

3.description:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the most injured ally.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies at the start of a battle, the first ally death does not count towards the loss of a Medal in <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGNS</color> and <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, if the most injured ally is an <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, heal that ally for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health
On Turn, if the most injured ally is an <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> heal that ally for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health

4.description:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the most injured ally. If that ally is an <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, heal that ally for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health. If that ally is an <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> heal again for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Resistance.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies at the start of a battle, the first ally death does not count towards the loss of a Medal in <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGNS</color> and <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color>.

5.description:
On Turn, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to the most injured ally. If that ally is an <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color>, heal that ally for <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health. If that ally is an <color=#fff568>ASTONISHING X-MEN</color> heal again for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance. <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance.

If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies at the start of a battle, the first ally death does not count towards the loss of a Medal in <color=#fff568>CAMPAIGNS</color> and <color=#fff568>CHALLENGES</color>.
